skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Specialized in building responsive and interactive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Focused on creating clean, efficient code and seamless user experiences with modern development practices.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces with a focus on enhancing user experience. Skilled in wireframing, prototyping, and implementing responsive designs that align with user needs and business goals.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Experienced in creating modern and responsive websites using Webflow. Skilled in designing and implementing custom layouts, animations, and interactions to deliver visually appealing and high-performing web solutions without compromising functionality.
